  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ToolUi.NoteRenderer
    Renders the note displayed along with a type or a field.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnchorTag
    Equivalent to the HTML A tag where its href attribute may be set to a URL or a Dari object.

    Represents a generic content.

    Unpublished object or unsaved changes to an existing object.
    DraftStatus
    Status applied to drafts to control workflow.
    EmbeddedDataOperation  
    FieldAccessFilter
    Internal filter that adds <span data-field> to the response whenever an object field is accessed.

    Represents previous revisions of objects.

    Modification of an object for specifying SEO-related overrides.
    Seo.Static
    Static utility methods.
    Seo.TypeModification
    Modification of a type for specifying various fields that are checked to get SEO-related data.
    Site

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Content.Searchable
    Specifies whether the instances of the target type should be searchable.
    Renderer.Engine
    Specifies the engine used to render instances of the target type.
    Renderer.Script
    Specifies the script used to render instances of the target type.
    Seo.DescriptionFields
    Specifies an array of fields that are checked to get the meta description from an instance of the target type.
    Seo.KeywordsFields
    Specifies an array of fields that are checked to get the meta keywords from an instance of the target type.
    ToolUi.CompatibleTypes
    Specifies an array of compatible types that the target type may switch to.
    ToolUi.FieldDisplayType
    Specifies the internal type used to render the target field.
    ToolUi.FieldPlaceholder Deprecated
    Use ToolUi.Placeholder instead.
    ToolUi.FieldSorted
    Specifies whether the values in the target field should be sorted before being saved.
    ToolUi.FieldSuggestedMaximum Deprecated
    Use ToolUi.SuggestedMaximum instead.
    ToolUi.FieldSuggestedMinimum Deprecated
    Use ToolUi.SuggestedMinimum instead.
    ToolUi.Heading
    Specifies the text to display before the target field.
    ToolUi.Hidden
    Specifies whether the target is hidden in the UI.
    ToolUi.InputProcessorPath
    Specifies the path to the processor used to render and update the target field.
    ToolUi.InputSearcherPath
    Specifies the path to the searcher used to find a value for the target field.
    ToolUi.Note
    Specifies the note displayed along with the target in the UI.
    ToolUi.NoteHtml
    Specifies the note, in raw HTML, displayed along with the target in the UI.
    ToolUi.NoteRendererClass
    Specifies the class that can render the note displayed along with the target in the UI.
    ToolUi.OnlyPathed
    Specifies whether the target field may only contain objects with paths.
    ToolUi.Placeholder
    Specifies the target field's placeholder text.
    ToolUi.ReadOnly
    Specifies whether the target is read-only.
    ToolUi.Referenceable
    Specifies whether the instances of the target type can be referenced by a referential text object.
    ToolUi.RichText
    Specifies whether the target field should offer rich-text editing options.
    ToolUi.SuggestedMaximum
    Specifies the suggested maximum size of the target field value.
    ToolUi.SuggestedMinimum
    Specifies the suggested minimum size of the target field value.
